links.*: Of the Ordering of the Shire
The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
The '''Postmaster''' of [[the Shire]] was the head of the [[Messenger Service]]. The office was attached to the [[Mayor of Michel Delving|Mayoralty of Michel Delving]].<ref>{{FR|Ordering}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Position is occupied by "Postmaster Proudfoot", who is found in [[Michel Delving]] appropriately right next to [[Mayor of Michel Delving|Mayor]] [[Will Whitfoot]] and is involved in multiple quests involving the services of the [[Quick Post]].
